content: make your own crochet gingko leaf my easy step by step written tutorial the ginkgo biloba is one of the oldest living tree species in our world and is the only living survivor of an ancient group of trees that date back to before dinosaurs it s so ancient the species is known as a living fossil the ginkgo had a very distinctive green two-lobed fan shape leaf that turns to a golden ocher during the autumn make your own ginkgo crochet leaf in any yarn of your choice with the matching size crochet hook a beautiful quick easy pattern which can be used as a bookmark coaster added to a granny square or if you have some wire this would make a gorgeous crochet necklace or set of earrings free crochet ginkgo leaf pattern moara crochet crochet pattern includes step by step written / photo instructions showing you how to easily make your own crochet leaf in a few steps make with any yarn from your stash & the matching crochet hook a quick easy pattern ideal for every crocheter pattern made using any yarn size of your choice with crochet hook to match your yarn size the pattern is written in us terms and includes conversion table in uk terms step by step tutorial with written instructions & additional photos made to craft yarn council standards if you have any queries or questions feel free to contact me at any time i am always here & happy to help to get the latest news & updates on moara crochet please follow me on instagram at www instagram com/moara_crochet or like my page at https //www facebook com/moaracrochet this pattern is copyright moara crochet © if the item is handmade by you you are welcome to sell as many of the finished product as you wish i do ask that you credit me as the designer and provide a link to my etsy shop if you re selling online thank you roseanna
